Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone! The game "Molly and the Butter Thieves" was written last year, but I just recently added it to this site. It was written for Shufflecomp: Disc 2, which was a mini-comp where everyone got a randomly assigned song list, and had to come up with a game inspired by the songs. Participants had a little over a month to write the game. (So it's a fairly short game.) It is also inspired by folklore. Enjoy! You can play it here. If you get stuck and need a walkthrough, there's one at the IFDB page.
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone! The game "Molly and the Butter Thieves" was written last year, but I just recently added it to this site. It was written for Shufflecomp: Disc 2, which was a mini-comp where everyone got a randomly assigned song list, and had to come up with a game inspired by the songs. Participants had a little over a month to write the game. (So it's a fairly short game.) It is also inspired by folklore. Enjoy!

You can play it here.

If you get stuck and need a walkthrough, there's one at the IFDB page.
